message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a fantastic deal, and I know it's worth a lot to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,250.  That's still a great deal for you, considering the value you place on the product.  Let's find a way to make this work!
I understand your position, Alice. However, I'm still not able to meet at $9,250. I'm willing to go up to $9,100. This is my final offer.
